head.title: Home - Williamsburg Local Schools

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.div: 549 A West Main Street, Williamsburg, OH 45176

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

hr.br:
In accordance with Governor DeWine's new regulations,
Williamsburg Local Schools will be closed until May 1st.
The administration and teachers will be touching base with
students and families to address the continuing remote learning.
Thank you for your patience as we are all in this together.
Please continue to check the website, social media,
school messenger emails & calls for future information.

hr.span:
All primary voting is by mail now. It must be completed before April 28th. All information can be found here: https://www.ohiosos.gov/elections/voters/
You can still view the information linked above as well as the Vote For Burg Kids website below. If you have questions feel free to email them to the email below and someone will still get back to you during this quarantine time.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: If you have further questions, please visit

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: or email the levy committee at voteforburgkids@gmail.com.

div.div: Please read for full information for meals during this time of closure.
